Youth Play

Awarded by Leah Anderson to:

Andy Straw & Caleb Winter for excellent improvisation skills incorporating a wardrobe malfunction in 3d Arts Company's Treasure Island

Ben Andrews for a magnificent program design including the dramaturgical information insert for Trinity Grammar & Ruyton Girls' Schools' The Book of Will

Awarded by Marg Henley to:

Breannah Arnel & Molly Odgers for impressive use of makeup to create scarring in St Helena Secondary College's Frankenstein

Cranbourne Secondary College for the innovative use of a fragmentary set in Indelible Ink

Awarded by Mudit Dhami to:

Donvale Christian College for the diverting ping pong opening sequence of The Comedy of Errors

Cranbourne Secondary College for effectively incorporating varying theatrical styles in Indelible Ink

Vermont Secondary College for the creative use of theatre space to make Chicago an immersive experience for the audience

Mountain District Musical Society for the amazing transformation of Elsa's dress in Frozen Jr
